channel.title: Black Mesa Lobby remake by Ansith*
channel.description: I'm sure some of you older members have seen this, but since it was last posted way back when the forums were on gamernode, I thought I'd post it. This is a HL1 version of the black mesa lobby by the mapper Ansith. Get the map [url='https://www.twhl.co.za/vault.php?map=4973']here[/url], and you can watch reviews [url='https://www.twhl.co.za/motm.php?id=7']here[/url]. Little something to help tide you all over until BM is finished. * Disclaimer: I did not make this, nor am I trying to take credit for it. I just happened to be playing it again tonight (spawning monsters in it is fun) and realized most of the newer members probably haven't seen it.[/SIZE]

item.title: Black Mesa Lobby remake by Ansith*

item.description:

Because Chuck Norris is overrated.

Finally.

item.title: Black Mesa Lobby remake by Ansith*
item.dc:creator: RandomSpoon
item.description:
JeffMOD:

No it doesn’t.
What version did you try?

It does for me. Quite surprised that i put up with it actually.

Most common ones for me are:

  • Random Crashes for no apparent reason

  • Crash if i try to access the “flags” tab more than once in one sitting (sometimes it doesn’t even let me have the first)

But getting back on topic. I remember that map, 'twas an EPIC WIN if memory serves.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Lobby remake by Ansith*
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Don’t carve with cylinders and you should be fine. If not, TWHL’s forums or the Valve wikican always help.
EDIT: Having less than 9 texture WADs loaded can help reduce errors, as well.

Read full topic
